entries.title: AI changelog web app completed with deployment
entries.whats_new: The new web application now automatically summarizes GitHub commits into a changelog, with full deployment on Railway and Vercel, and code cleanup.
entries.breaking_change: The changelog system is now fully automated and user-friendly, changing how users generate and view changelogs.
entries.impact: Users can now get automatically summarized and impactful changelogs without manual effort, improving visibility of project updates.

entries.title: Enhancement: Accurate summarization of breaking changes
entries.whats_new: The system now asks the language model to produce more precise summaries of breaking changes.
entries.impact: Users will receive clearer explanations of breaking changes, making updates easier to understand.

entries.title: Bug fixes on save to git method and LLM bugs
entries.whats_new: Fixed bugs related to saving data to GitHub repositories and issues in the language model operations.
entries.impact: The system now handles saving processes more reliably, ensuring data integrity and smooth operation.

entries.title: API and environment setup for deployment
entries.whats_new: Setup the cache saving strategy, local and remote storage, and API connection to GitHub.
entries.impact: Enhances the backend functionality for better performance, cache management, and user data handling.

entries.title: Configuration and deployment to Railway and GitHub
entries.whats_new: Deployed backend and frontend services for changelog generation and interaction via Railway and webhooks.
entries.impact: Allows users to interact with live changelog services, automating updates from repositories.

entries.title: Open API configuration allowing user customization
entries.whats_new: Users can now configure their own Git repositories, OpenAI API keys, and model settings.
entries.breaking_change: Users have increased control over the system configurations, which may alter default behaviors.
entries.impact: Users can tailor the changelog generator to their specific project needs, including private repositories and custom models.

entries.title: Improved interface management and changelog detail page
entries.whats_new: Refined front-end to better manage interfaces and enable detailed log views, with click navigation.
entries.impact: Provides a more intuitive and interactive experience for users exploring changelog details.

entries.title: Cache strategy for faster changelog display
entries.whats_new: Back-end now generates a JSON cache file first; frontend loads this cache for faster display.
entries.breaking_change: Users will now see cached changelog data instead of real-time generation, speeding up load times.
entries.impact: Improves performance and responsiveness for users viewing changelogs.
